relation: Great for these types of students
I'm in Formula SAE, and it's a great time.
There is a lake really close to campus, so if you ski or wakeboard, you can do that very easily.
Just find a good group of friends to hang out with. Go to the football games on the weekends.
Definitely come visit Clemson before making your choice, and I bet you'll love it here.
Clemson has been great so far. The atmosphere is great and everyone is very nice. The classes are some what difficult, but that's how college is.
pageTitle: Clemson University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {800719=Clemson embodies the perfect combination of academic excellence, school pride, and faculty/student relationships. Applied learning has helped to advance Clemson to the top 20 public schools in the country as of 2014. Overall the University wants you to succeed in academics as well as future career opportunities, producing successful students., 578417=I'd say there's probably around a 1000 people affiliated in greek life? It's everywhere but you definitely DON'T have to join to make friends or feel complete, 23290=Clemson has many things to do. There are always sports going on. You can join intramural, club, or varsity sports. There are many clubs and leisure skill classes you can take. Clemson also has random activities that they send you emails about. Last December, Clemson even went to the extent to set up an ice skating rink right on campus., 814391=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 667409=Clemson is a great campus to be on during the school year and even when school is not in session. It is ranked in the top 25 for colleges and has great staff that are very welcoming. I cannot wait to start in August., 662857=I had no intention of going to Clemson until I toured in April of senior year. The campus was beautiful and there was something about it that made it feel like a close-knit community. There's not much to do in the surrounding area if you don't have a car but there are so many organizations on campus that if you just give your email at the organizations fair, you'll always be a part of something and have something to do. I'm not a huge fan of the housing and dining but that's pretty much all that's ever bothered me., 434569=Keep your GPA up and your SAT score high. Clemson is selective, but it never hurts to apply even if you think you will not get in! Also, never think that just because you have a 1600 on the SAT or a 4.0 you will get in. Clemson seems to look a lot at extracurricular activities too., 199601=clemson is definitely a sports-minded school. football season welcomes the tigers in august. in december the torch is handed to basketball season. and in march we are graced by baseball season. throughout the year there are also other sporting events to go to and for those who are not interested in sports, clemson offers great bands for concerts in the coliseum on campus. clemson also organizes social events for all tigers, not just greek life. if clemson can't entertain you, there is sure to be something happening in charlotte, nc or atlanta, ga which are both a short two hour drive from clemson.}

textAfterTable: Sejal from Orangeburg, SC 07/16/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 18 out of 18 people found this review useful. 2 of 186 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Clemson welcomes any and all students. If you feel that this University is for you, you will have that special moment where your heart tells you that Clemson University is the school for you. Tips for prospective students Dear Prospective Students, Do you best at your college or university that you may be attending because any school means hard work. The degree you are trying to obtain will not be given to you, but instead you have to earn it. Attending college is the start of your new life; so use your advantages the best you may know how and make something of yourself. The world needs intelligent young women to continue making it a better place. Always strive for success and never give up. Am enjoying being here Clemson University is a great college with much to offer. The campus
